an10.110:1.4: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa niddhanta honti;
an10.110:1.5: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
an10.110:3.2: ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa niddhanta honti;
an10.110:3.3: sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
an10.110:3.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa niddhamaniya dhamma”ti.
